snippet: Prosecutors said that lawyers for Officer Gilberto Valle had been offering a distorted view of him, centered on the idea that his communications were only fantasy role playing.
abstract: Federal prosecutors work to bolster notion that the actions of New York City Police Officer Gilberto Valle, accused of plotting to kidnap, kill and eat women, were real and not fantasy; prosecutors contend that lawyers for Valle have been offering a distorted view of him in the case, centered on idea that his communications were only fantasy role playing.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said that lawyers for Officer Gilberto Valle had been offering a distorted view of him, centered on the idea that his communications were only fantasy role playing.

headline.seo: Prosecutors Try to Bolster Core Idea in Cannibal Case
headline.main: Prosecutors Try to Bolster Core Idea in Cannibal Case
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Try to Bolster Core Idea in Cannibal Case
